# provisioners

View and manage provisioner daemons and jobs

Aliases:

- provisioner

## Usage

```console
coder provisioners
```

## Subcommands

| Name                                          | Purpose                                     |
| --------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| [<code>list</code>](./provisioners_list.md)   | List provisioner daemons in an organization |
| [<code>jobs</code>](./provisioners_jobs.md)   | View and manage provisioner jobs            |
| [<code>start</code>](./provisioners_start.md) | Run a provisioner daemon                    |
| [<code>keys</code>](./provisioners_keys.md)   | Manage provisioner keys                     |
